member.name: RM_FILTER_ACTION
member.summary: Specifies the type of modification that is applied to restart or shutdown actions.

member.name: RM_FILTER_ACTION.RmNoRestart
member.summary: Prevents the restart of the specified application or service.

member.name: RM_FILTER_ACTION.RmNoShutdown
member.summary: Prevents the shut down and restart of the specified application or service.
